name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
This course helps students develop basic English language reading and conversation skills through study of general knowledge texts about a wide-range of cultural topics, including science, history, art, and politics.
scorePolicy:
Grades:
　　Class Midterm and Final 70 % 
　　University Midterm and Final 30%
Attendance:   a combination of 4 absences or late days =  -10 points from course grade
